author: bridge-bot
content: <nashatyrev_a> Does it make sense to set `CUSTODY_REQUIREMENT = 64` for the initial milestones to abstract over discovering/peering difficulties (with this value all peers are equally subscribe/custody all the columns)?

author: bridge-bot
content: <fradamt> Seems reasonable to me. Just making sure that the transition from blob distribution to data column sidecar distribution works seems like a good starting point
